Author: urish
Content:
Congrats!

IMHO having two deadline counters is confusing (our experience shows that people have difficulty handling a single deadline).

Author: urish
Content: One way to solve it is to have the "purchase" deadline as the final deadline to purchase + submit, and the "submit" deadline as the final deadline to submit any last revisions or so

Author: rebelmike
Content:
I think it would make sense just to have the purchase countdown on the main page.

Then wherever the interface for submitting updates after purchase is, put the second countdown there.

Author: mithro_
Content: I created a GitHub Issue @ https://github.com/wafer-space/wafer-space.github.io/issues/49 -- will fix it shortly.
